Dear {!Account.Name} Team,
Welcome to VinSolutions! As your VinPro, I will be your personal advocate within the company. I will be providing assistance with escalated issues and to help you reach your fullest potential by helping you navigate through the system. As a VinPro, my days are typically filled with scheduled calls and meetings. In an effort to ensure you receive a timely response, please consider emailing me if Iâ€™m unavailable via phone.
Support related issues can be submitted via Email, Customer Portal or by Phone.
Email: support@vinsolutions.com
Phone: 1-800-980-7488 (Mon-Fri 8am-7pm, Sat 8am-4pm CST)
Customer Portal: The Portal is where you can create a ticket and find solutions to frequently asked questions.
In order to better assist you, please make sure you create a ticket with the support department and send me an email with the ticket number. By providing me this information, I can follow the ticket and make sure it gets resolved in a timely fashion.
I look forward to speaking with you next week. Please remember if you can't reach me by phone, you can email me. Also, if you have a support related issue, you will need to create a ticket and email me the ticket number so I can follow up on the progress. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. Once again, Welcome to VinSolutions!
Aaron Scheidt I worked as a service writer for two years and moved into the transportation industry and sold shuttle buses and school buses for 7 years. I also have 9 years of experience in the automotive industry both in service and sales, which gives me a good understanding of the day-to-day life at a dealership and their needs. I have been with VinSolutions for 8 months, starting as a virtual trainer and then becoming a VinPro. My experiences have helped me succeed in my position as a VinPro.
Sincerely, Aaron Scheidt VinPro Midwest Region VinSolutions.com aaron.scheidt@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 45811 C: 913-956-9268
